thread.title: Katy Perry announces new look and Grammy performance: is she about to make a comeback?
thread.title_full: Katy Perry announces new look and Grammy performance: is she about to make a comeback?

author: Helena Horton
title: Katy Perry announces new look and Grammy performance: is she about to make a comeback?
text:
News Katy Perry announces new look and Grammy performance: is she about to make a comeback? Katy Perry has driven fans into meltdown by announcing a performance and dying her hair Credit: Katy Perry/Instagram Helena Horton 7 February 2017 • 11:20am 
K aty Perry has excited her fans by announcing a comeback performance at the Grammys and drastically changing her look. 
Typically brunette, the star has dyed her hair blonde and gone for a pastel pink look. 
The pop singer, who hasn't released an album since 2013, and the only offering since then has been her single Rise, which had a lukewarm reception by fans used to her previously steady stream of earworms. Watch | Katy Perry endorses Hillary Clinton at rally 01:08 
H er work since then has mainly taken place off-stage, she's been on tour and spent the bulk of last year campaigning for Hillary Clinton. 
Some have speculated she may use the Grammys to take a shot at Donald Trump, who she has consistently criticised. 
However, others are hoping she returns to her music and uses the event to debut a new single. — KATY PERRY (@katyperry) February 7, 2017 @RecordingAcad @katyperry @CBS you guys keep making excellent choice after excellent choice wow pic.twitter.com/DRalINFEpX — Karla Rodriguez (@ohkarli_) February 7, 2017 Chained To The Rhyhtm
